original: Österberg, Nils, distriktsveterinär, Motala, f. 26/11/86 i Sthlm av trädg:-mäst. Anders Gustaf Ö. o. Ulrika Sofia Andersson. G. 17 m. Ruth Blomgren. Barn: Ake f. 18, Margareta 20, Karin 21, Ingrid 26. — Stud:ex. 06, utex. fr. veter :högsk. 10. Distr :veter. i Nordimark 10, i Årjängs distr. 13. Distr :veter. i östergötl. 1. f. Motala distr. fr. 28. RVO.
translated: Österberg, Nils, district veterinarian, Motala, b. 26/11/86 in Stockholm, son of the master gardener Anders Gustaf Ö. and Ulrika Sofia Andersson. Married on 17 with Ruth Blomgren. Children: Ake b. 18, Margareta b. 20, Karin b. 21, Ingrid b. 26. Completed high school in 1906, graduated from veterinary college in 1910. Worked as district veterinarian in Nordimark from 1910, in Årjäng district from 1913. Became a district veterinarian in Östergötland in 1910, stationed in Motala district from 1928. Received the Royal Order of Vasa (RVO).
